info.id: HR76134 - Error messages are misleading when missing value in MO
info.description: HR76134 - Error messages are misleading when missing value in MO

config.cli_expected_output_1: ['ERROR: Specific element not found|ERROR: \'UserManagement\' is incomplete']
config.cli_expected_output_2: ['ERROR: Specific element not found|ERROR: \'UserManagement\' is incomplete']
config.cli_expected_output_3: ['ERROR: Can not instantiate system created object|ERROR: \'UserManagement\' is incomplete', 'ManagedElement=1']
config.cli_expected_output_4: ['ERROR: Can not instantiate system created object|ERROR: \'UserManagement\' is incomplete', 'ManagedElement=1', 'ERROR: Command not found.']
config.cli_expected_output_5: ['ERROR: Can not instantiate system created object|ERROR: \'UserManagement\' is incomplete', 'ManagedElement=1', 'ERROR: Command not found.|ERROR: Unknown identifier: \'Ldap\'']
